Description_lang: Heals the target for $o1 over $d. While channeling, Enveloping Mist$?s227344[, Surging Mist,][]$?s124081[, Zen Pulse,][] and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.$?s117907[Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.][]$?s388477[Soothing Mist heals a second injured ally within $388478A2 yds for $388477s1% of the amount healed.][]
AuraDescription_lang: Healing for $w1 every $t1 sec.$?a388681[Damage taken reduced by $w2%.][]

description_blz.en_US: Heals the target for 61,989 over 7.2 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
description_blz.es_MX: Sana 61,989 p. al objetivo durante 7.2 s. Durante la canalización, Niebla envolvente y Vivificar pueden lanzarse de forma instantánea sobre el objetivo.
description_blz.pt_BR: Cura 61.989 pontos de vida do alvo ao longo de 7,2 s. Enquanto canaliza Bruma Envolvente e Vivificar podem ser lançados instantaneamente no alvo.
description_blz.de_DE: Heilt das Ziel im Verlauf von 7,2 Sek. um 61.989 Gesundheit. Während der Kanalisierung können 'Einhüllender Nebel' und 'Beleben' als Spontanzauber auf das Ziel gewirkt werden.
description_blz.en_GB: Heals the target for 61,989 over 7.2 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
description_blz.es_ES: Sana 61989 p. al objetivo durante 7,2 s. Durante la canalización, se puede lanzar Niebla envolvente y Vivificar al instante sobre el objetivo.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vous rendez à la cible 61989 points de vie en 7,2 s. Pendant la canalisation, vous pouvez lancer Brume enveloppante et Vivifier instantanément sur la cible.
description_blz.it_IT: Cura il bersaglio di 61.989 in 7,2 s. Durante la canalizzazione, è possibile lanciare istantaneamente Nebbia Avvolgente e Vivificazione sul bersaglio.
description_blz.ru_RU: Восполняет цели 61989 ед. здоровья за 7,2 сек. Во время поддержания "Окутывающий туман" и "Оживить" можно применять к цели мгновенно.
description_blz.ko_KR: 대상의 생명력을 7.2초에 걸쳐 61,989만큼 회복시킵니다. 시전 중에는 포용의 안개, 생기 충전을 대상에게 즉시 시전할 수 있습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在7.2秒內為目標恢復61,989點生命力。引導此技能時，迷霧繚繞與生氣勃勃可立即施加在目標上。
description_blz.zh_CN: 在7.2秒内为目标恢复61,989点生命值。引导期间可以使对目标施放的氤氲之雾和活血术变为瞬发。
